channel.title: Comments on: You Don’t Have To Be Pretty To Be Successful

item.title: By: kenrick
item.dc:creator: kenrick
item.description: amen to that. word press is uber ugly underneath, but hey, it works. most users will never care about it, but for those who want to hack it, its kinda rough. maybe in their next major release they will be able to clean up the code base somewhat.
item.content:encoded: amen to that. word press is uber ugly underneath, but hey, it works. most users will never care about it, but for those who want to hack it, its kinda rough. maybe in their next major release they will be able to clean up the code base somewhat.
